forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High around 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low near -10C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 17F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low near 15F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around in the afternoon. High -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High around 0C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High near 35F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
